title: [M搬运]Lucky Block Bedwars|幸运方块起床战争地图！
author: 女神M哥
txt_content:
Lucky Block Bedwars



地图简介:
这是一个起床战争的地图
但采用了幸运方块，loot++模组
总体建筑比较细腻
觉得合适
可以用到你的服务器上！




截图时间






image.png (343.63 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-1-26 16:34 上传









作者信息:
ID：ThePikaChuP
作者链接:https://www.planetminecraft.com/member/thepikachup/

作者原话:
Beta Tester Wanted!
For new updates releasing to the map I will be in need of some beta testers! If you are able to help out leave a discord username and hashtag below and if selected you will be contacted by me and given a server ip to help with testing!

[size=0.83333]Mods:
1. Lucky block mod
2. Loot ++ mod
3. Custom Trades
4. World Edit
How to install:
[size=0.66667]1. Go to your windows search bar and type in %appdata%
2. Click into the roaming folder
3. Click into the .minecraft folder
4. Unzip the file and drag the Lucky Block Bedwars 1.8.-1.12.2 into the saves folder
5. Next drag the recommended mods into the mods folder and the addons into the addons/lucky blocks folder
6. Start game and enjoy!


如有搬运不足之处还望指出！
